title: Tell 'Ira
description: Tell located on the 'Ira mountain spur at the southernmost spur of the Hebron hills in the northeastern Negev. Tell 'Ira has archaeological remains from the Early Bronze Age, Iron Age, Hellenistic and Roman periods, Byzantine, and early Islamic periods.

properties.description: Point based on an OpenStreetMap node representing Tell 'Ira.
properties.title: OSM location of Tell 'Ira
